downloadTitle: Security and Authentication in Microsoft Dynamics CRM: Connectivity and Firewall Port Requirements in On-Premise Deployments
downloadDescription: This document provides guidance on the connectivity requirements between Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 and other systems to assist readers with proper firewall configuration in customer environments.

downloadFile.name: CRM4 NB - SEC - Connectivity and Firewall Port Reqs - On-Prem.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/2/3/9/2392d8ca-3ba2-49c1-bd45-91c478bb7f9f/CRM4 NB - SEC - Connectivity and Firewall Port Reqs - On-Prem.pdf

detailsSection: Many data centers include firewalls between the end-users and the servers and other integrated systems that support an implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0. This document provides guidance on the connectivity requirements between Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 and other systems to assist readers with proper firewall configuration in customer environments.
detailsSection_file_name: CRM4 NB - SEC - Connectivity and Firewall Port Reqs - On-Prem.pdf
installInstructionSection:
To start the download, click Download, click Go, and then do one of the following:

To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.

To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: security and Authentication in Microsoft Dynamics CRM: Field-level Security in Microsoft Dynamics CRM: Options and Constraints
